title: BrainOn
description: Participated in the 1st edition of BrainOn, an ideathon focused on creating innovative solutions using AI technologies. Developed a prototype to address a specific problem and secured 2nd place in the competition.

title: PressStart
description: Hosted a workshop at ESTIN - Bejaia titled PressStart, aimed at teaching the basics of Game Development. Shared my experience with Unity's Animation system to help students start their game development journey.

title: Game Jam
description: Competed in the 1st edition of GDG Algiers Game Jam as a 3D modeler with my team, UnitDash. Collaborated to create a game prototype, leading the team to win 1st place in the competition.

title: IdeaTech
description: Participated in the 2nd edition of IdeaTech, a two-day ideathon where creative students design digital solutions for real-world problems. Contributed to a team project showcasing innovative problem-solving.

title: GDG Student
description: Member of the Google Developer Student Club (GDSC) ESTIN, part of the UI/UX Design Department. Contributed to the ESTIN Bib website project, a community for developers and students organizing technical events.

title: ByteCraft
description: Served as a Game Developer and 3D Designer/Animator at UnitDash, a department within ByteCraft, an ESTIN club focused on computer science fields and fostering creativity in technology.

title: Starbucks M’sila
description: Worked as a Graphic Designer for Starbucks M’sila CoffeeShop in 2022, creating designs to enhance the brand’s presence and improve customer experience.

title: UnitDash
description: Actively contributed as a 3D Modeler in UnitDash, a Game Development group focused on creating immersive gaming experiences through innovative design and development.
